None of the 2 serials provided worked for me
All of the serials provided are blacklisted.

I was having the same problem with the two serials not working for me but I think it was because the patch wasn't installing. At first I was right clicking and running the patch as administrator and the patch kept failing. The second time around I right clicked, went to  properties and under the compatibility tab checked the box to run as administrator. It worked after that. Hope this helps.
Thanx for the up

As I've said before, version 12 is buggy, most notably audio is out of sync when recoding, so I've gone back to nero 10, and everything is working fine now, But I have a question...

Does anyone know how to install 3Dsmart menu templates from nero 12 content pack, to nero 10?

Just copying the relevant files to the folder doesn't work... Nerovision just doesn't see them.

I mean I have a content packs installed for nero 10, but there were few new ones in nero 12 which I'd like to get.

Anyone?
